mapper.select:
select i.STATIC_ID "staticId",i.TF_CLO "tfClo",i.TF_COMMENT "tfComment",i.ORG_ID "orgId",GET_ORGNAME(i.ORG_ID) "orgName", i.FSORT "fsort",i.PARENT_STATIC_ID "parentStaticId", case when i.PARENT_STATIC_ID !='0' then pi.TF_COMMENT else '' end as "pTfComment" from td_static_info i left join td_static_info pi on i.PARENT_STATIC_ID = pi.STATIC_ID where 1=1
and (regexp_like(GET_ORGNAME(i.ORG_ID), #{conditiions.searchParams, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or regexp_like(i.TF_CLO, #{conditiions.searchParams, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or regexp_like(i.TF_COMMENT, #{conditiions.searchParams, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
order by i.org_id,i.fsort
